short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for dealing with and manipulating different time formats and zones with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool that helps with converting time from and to different formats and timezones, users could also opt in to use a popup menu that includes different time formats of a given date whenever a user selects any string that represents a date
